org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.impl

Class ScaleVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.BaseGraphVertex
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.impl.ScaleVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Trainable, GraphVertex

    public class ScaleVertex
extends BaseGraphVertex
    A ScaleVertex is used to scale the size of activations of a single layer
    For example, ResNet activations can be scaled in repeating blocks to keep variance under control.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
